product_name: Serfas True 750 USB Front Bike Light
long_description: Suitable for commuting or exploring low-light singletrack, the Serfas True 750 front bike light brightens your path with an impressive 750-lumen beam and recharges at the USB port of your computer. Offers 90 min. in overdrive (750 lumens). 2 hrs 40 min. on high (480 lumens); 3 hrs. 20 min. on medium (330 lumens); 7 hrs. 30 min. on low (160 lumens), and 6 hrs. on flashing. The Serfas True 750 front bike light includes a USB charging cable, wall adapter, handlebar mount, helmet mount, and an interchangeable lens for standard or wide beam. Charge time with USB: 5 hrs. and 30 min.; charge time with wall charger 4 hrs. 195g light and 40g handlebar bracket weigh a total of 235g.
short_description: Suitable for commuting or exploring low-light singletrack, the Serfas True 750 front bike light brightens your path with an impressive 750-lumen beam and recharges at the USB port of your computer.
